{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Medialink |model=MWN-WAPR300N |revision= |upc=813077013718 |ean= |asin=B00A3YN0Z0;US; |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/22/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Tenda |manuf_model=W368R |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=V7TW368R |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6691;;2; |flags=schematics |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=medialink |default_ssid_regex=^medialink$ |default_ip=192.168.8.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=14:35:8B |oui_eth=14:35:8B }} [http://www.mediabridgeproducts.com/store/pc/faq/MWN-WAPR300N%20User%20Guide.pdf User Guide]
[http://www.medialinkproducts.com/docs/MWN-WAPR300N_DATA%20SHEET.pdf Datasheet on the '''Medialink''' site], which seems to show a different device (shell looks like an old-style '''TP-LINK''' shell)
Default settings (IP + credentials + SSID) are per '''Medialink''''s manual / user guide.
==Additional external links== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32272-medialink-mwn-wapr300n-wireless-n-broadband-router-300-mbps-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :The FCC ID is noted to be the same as that used by the [[Tenda W368R]] (which is V7TW368R). That's the one on the [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/router-charts/products/0/1261-medialink-mwnwapr300n Router Charts]. :Flash + RAM indicated as 2 MiB and 16 MiB ===In the news=== *[http://arstechnica.com/tech-policy/2014/05/lawyers-bully-redditor-for-negative-amazon-com-router-review ''Router company that threatened a reviewer loses Amazon selling license'' on '''ArsTechnica'''] **[http://www.reddit.com/r/news/comments/253h24/update_router_company_that_threatened_a_redditor/ ''/r/news (Reddit)'' post regarding the '''Ars''' article]
